name: danamojo
author: Danamojo

sections.description:
New Fields are added in the setting do user can add custom js and css too

danamojo payment integration plugin offer to display the NGOs on your pages and posts using the shortcode. This plugin is a wrapper that is built around a saas platform danamojo.org. To support existing customers of the platform, the relevant data needs to be fetched from our server https://danamojo.org. This will be an SSL secured connection to ensure customer data integrity remains intact.

By default [danamojo shortcodeid=”1″] shortcode will be created after activating and setting up the NGOs id on setting page.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire danamojo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen (Plugins > Installed Plugins).

You will find danamojo menu in your WordPress admin screen.

  1. Copy the shortcode from danamojo => ShortCodes and use it on any page or post.
sections.faq:
Can NGOs be embedded through a shortcode?

The danamojo shortcode [danamojo shortcodeid=”1″] can be used in any page or post within your WordPress blog.
The shortcode will automatically be replaced by the NGOs lists.
